item.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen , custom respawning problem
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

Football1smylife:

It’s to fix a dupe.

there are 2 lines i found that might help ;
outStream.createFrame(109);

and

properLogout = true; this line saves yer char i think , not approved

one of these loggs you out , the other one saves yer char file , thats what i think…
try adding them to a new command , see what happens

EDIT : what you do is find where the server adds the new interface when you’re in the wild and add that line in that method , let me try finding it…

@Cres wrote:

Football1smylife:

This is PROJECT INSANITY. How would I make it so that when a player enters the wilderness it automatically saves game for them? I’ve tried making a code myself, but it would not work.

many people want this , idk why
logging out saves your file , idk how to do so manually…

item.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen , custom respawning problem
item.dc:creator: @Football1smylife Football1smylife
item.description:
@Football1smylife wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:5, topic:376714”][quote author=Football1smylife link=topic=472636.msg3456480#msg3456480 date=1294079998]

I don’t really know, but get the ‘dead’ npcType of the 2nd Kalphite Queen, put a delay and make it spawn the first one again.

this is all handled inside the death method ;
1st form dead = spawn 2nd
2nd form dead = spawn 1st form after delay

That’s what I was trying to say. but I am guessing it didn’t work? =/
[/quote]

nope , tried changing order in which they are placed , lol , didnt work either.
i think the problem is at the delay tho , when i try this without the whole delaying thingy it works perfect[/quote]

You should take the delay out anyways. Make it harder for the players I don’t think there is a delay in real runescape either.

item.title: [PI] Kalphite Queen , custom respawning problem
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

so uhm , i’ve written this code that makes it so that when i kill the 1st form of the KQ , the second form spawns.
then when i kill the the second form it SHOULD spawn the 1st form again after a small delay ( respawn)
however , after that delay it just spawns the 2nd form again instead of the 1st one…

here’s the code

/**Kalphite Queen Start*/ /**Start Timer When 2nd Form Is Killed*/ /**Spawn 1st Form Again After Timer Hits 0*/ if (npcs[i].npcType == 1160) { if (spawnTimer > 0) { spawnTimer--; return; } else { spawnNpc2(1158,3477,9491,0,0,250,0,0,100); } } /**Spawn 2nd Form After Killing 1st*/ if (npcs[i].npcType == 1158) { spawnNpc2(1160,3477,9491,0,0,250,0,0,100); } /**End Of Kalphite Queen*/

Read full topic
